title: OOP Benefits Concept Map
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: High School Computer Science
description: Interactive concept map showing the five key benefits of Object-Oriented Programming

learningObjectives: Summarize the key benefits of OOP
Explain why OOP is preferred for larger programs
Connect OOP benefits to concrete code examples

keyQuestions: What are the five key benefits of OOP?
Why is OOP better than procedural code for large projects?
commonMisconceptions: OOP is always better than procedural programming
Encapsulation means data cannot be accessed at all
assessmentOpportunities: Name three benefits and give examples
Explain which benefit matters most for team projects
